t: Pukemark, Sweatyrocks, Demonlick: Made-for-Amazon Brand Names Are Getting Ridiculously Surreal
s: October 14, 2020 - I was recently shopping for clothes on Amazon when I noticed bizarre brand names popping up—more bizarre than usual, I mean. It’s common to come across unfamiliar brands on Amazon, where sellers are constantly fashioning product lines and whole brands around what shoppers are searching for.

s: April 15, 2023 - But the brands on Amazon now are more and more like just a random string of letters. Smarkl, Grobrty, Aayutug, Frbrtucal. t: How Amazon's Wooing Of Chinese Sellers Is Killing Small American Businesses
s: March 17, 2017 - While Amazon makes a big public stance against counterfeiters, the reality is that brands continue being outcompeted by knock-offs of their own products in the marketplace -- which is putting many innovative American brands on the brink of going out of business.
